Message.Instance: Invalid Visio edition specified: "{0}". The Visio Edition (platform) can be either "x86", "x64" or "all"
Invalid language specifid: "{0}". The language should be either LCID, such as "1033" or language code, such as "en-us".
Invalid value for {0} specifid: "{1}". The value should be non-negative integer.
Invalid parent Visio stencil file extension: "{0}". The parent file is expected to be a Visio stencil file (and have extension ".vss", ".vsx", ".vssx", or ".vssm")
Invalid parent Visio template file extension: "{0}". The parent file is expected to be a Visio template file (and have extension ".vst", ".vtx", ".vstx", or ".vstm")
Invalid parent Visio add-on file extension: "{0}". The parent file is expected to be a Visio add-on file (and have extension ".vsl", ".exe")
Invalid parent Visio help file extension: "{0}". The parent file is expected to be a Visio help file (and have extension ".chdm")
Invalid parent Visio template file extension: "{0}". The parent file is expected to be a Visio-related file and have one of Visio-related extensions.
Unable to get File Name from the parent File element, as it has no attributes. File Name must be specified.
